definition: lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom)/both funny and extremely embarrassing/between laughter and tears

sentences.english: K. sobbing so hard I thought she would puke.
sentences.chinese: 她哭得很厲害，我都以爲她要吐了。

sentences.english: It is divided into two parts: principal structure and ecological structure.
sentences.chinese: 哭嫁歌分爲主體結構和生態結構兩個部分。

sentences.english: Idou't promise to ask you to stop…But I can run with you.
sentences.chinese: 我不保證會使你笑，但我可以陪着你一起哭。

sentences.english: The girl deplores greatly to cry not to come out, but regrets again to also don't use.
sentences.chinese: 女孩心痛到哭不出來，可是再後悔也沒有用了。

sentences.english: Try to pacify the child, he's been crying for hours.
sentences.chinese: 快哄哄孩子，他哭了好幾個鐘頭了。

sentences.english: And when he thought thereon, he wept.
Brother scold by white Mary cried.
RenShun crying to be good English explanation, but good English coldly leave.
sentences.chinese: 仁順哭着向善英解釋，但是善英冷冷地離去。

sentences.english: Her delicate face flushed pink, her lips pouted softly, as if she were going to cry.
sentences.chinese: 她的臉激動的發紅，輕輕地撅着嘴，彷彿要哭似的。

sentences.english: Sherry couldn't keep from crying when she heard the terrible news.
sentences.chinese: 雪麗聽到這個壞消息的時候，忍不住哭了出來。

sentences.english: The sister cried her eyes out at the loss of her necklace.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐丟了項鍊以後，哭得死赴活來。

sentences.english: I could cry but I couldnot erase the crying imprints.
sentences.chinese: 我可以哭但是卻擦不掉哭泣的痕跡。

sentences.english: "Why are you crying?"he asked his Mon.
She stumbled into my arms and we wept together.
sentences.chinese: 她踉蹣跚蹌地撲進我的懷裏，我們都哭了。

sentences.english: Then, , methought, I wept to see thee.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我想，看到你我哭了。

sentences.english: But if you wanna cry , levis jeans sale, Cry on my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想哭，請哭在我的肩上。
